ch.ethz.inf.vs.persistingservice.resources.persisting
Class PersistingResource

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.RequestHandler, java.lang.Comparable<ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.Resource>
public class PersistingResource
extends ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalResource

The Class PersistingResource holds all the subresources for a single task. /persistingresource /type /running /observing /devicepath /deviceinfo /options /history

Method Detail

performDELETE

public void performDELETE(ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.DELETERequest request)
performDELETE removes the persisting resource from the resource tree. The task is stopped. If this was the last sub resource for some top resource, the top resource is removed as well.

Specified by:
performDELETE in interface ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.RequestHandler
Overrides:
performDELETE in class ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalResource
